meanings.definition: Tangled in a complex or intricate way.
meanings.sent1: The vines in the jungle were the tangliest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: Her hair became tangliest after a windy day at the beach.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle the Christmas lights was a tangliest task.
meanings.sent4: The mystery novel had the tangliest plot twists.
meanings.sent5: The tangliest maze at the carnival was impossible to solve.

meanings.sent1: The fishing line tangliest around the reel as he tried to cast.
meanings.sent2: The phone cord tangliest when she moved too quickly.
meanings.sent3: The puppy tangliest itself in the leash during the walk.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's ribbons tangliest gracefully in the air.
meanings.sent5: The branches tangliest together in a natural embrace.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the yarns, this one is the tangliest of them all.
meanings.sent2: The forest path was the tangliest of all the trails.
meanings.sent3: The garden hose claimed the title of the tangliest in the shed.
meanings.sent4: Among the knots, this one is the tangliest to undo.
meanings.sent5: The old rope was the tangliest in the sailor's collection.
